entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 10:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers or periods of drizzle beginning this evening changing to a few flurries later this evening and ending before morning. Clearing before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
